lines.text: Set the correct engine force to land the lunar module

secText:
Lesson:
1. [OBJ:actsec_ka50:Explore free-body diagrams] by creating a free-body diagram for an object with forces not acting on a line.
2. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_climber_question:solve for the force] acting on an object using a free-body diagram and trigonometric ratios.
3. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_eggslide_question:solve for the coefficient of static friction] using a free-body diagram and trigonometric ratios.
4. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_crate_question:solve for acceleration] of an object using a free-body diagram and trigonometric ratios.
5. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_asteroid_question:solve for force] using vector components and trigonometric ratios.
6. [OBJ:actsec_ka45:Land a lunar module] using Newton's laws, free-body diagrams, and trigonometric ratios.
